pageContext.geocode_address: 3800 Southwest Findlay Street, Seattle, WA 98126, USA
pageContext.public_note: Registration will happen via 6Crickets and will be open Monday, 9/16 - Friday, 9/29
pageContext.course_type_long_description: Traverse challenging obstacles, battle against fellow bots, and take on Play-Well instructor's colossal creations in the Battle Arena.  Customize your chassis to become a Minerbot, a Juggernaut, or an Iron Elephant. Apply real-world engineering and physics concepts to help you bash and crash your way to victory.
